nodes.text: Rebel Hero Journal is a forthcoming book written by Calliope Glass focusing on the characters Leia Organa, Ahsoka Tano, and Rey. Its story is to be written as an in-universe journal. The book is scheduled to be published by Studio Fun International on September 14, 2021.
Join some of the galaxy's favorite female rebels—including Princess Leia, Ahsoka, and Rey—and discover what it means to stand up for what's right in this illustrated prompted journal.

In a galaxy far, far away, young female rebels like Princess Leia, Ahsoka, and Rey have always done everything they could to stand up for what was right. Discover exactly what makes these brave heroes so special in this beautifully illustrated prompted journal. Young Star Warsfans [sic] will be encouraged to embrace their own heroic traits and learn that they, too, can be a rebel.
